name: WebGLRenderingContext.linkProgram
description: The WebGLRenderingContext interface's linkProgram() method links a given WebGLProgram, completing the process of preparing the GPU code for the program's fragment and vertex shaders.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'linkProgram' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
